text_block_list.text: —Time, a few hours ago.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: So, without further ado, let's begin the second meeting of the Yuushun Chocolate Contest Task Force. I, Mihono Bourbon, will take the lead.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yo hang on, are those the uniforms? Wowzers! Quality!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, they turned out great and I was surprised too. We decided that we should get used to wearing them.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's lovely, the design fits you perfectly, Bourbon…!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I am honored. Thank you for advising me with the "choice", that this one suited me best.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —Oh dear, it's 1 minute past the start time. Let's get right to it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: This year's theme is "Schoolhouse-inspired Chocolate Sweets".

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: "Schoolhouse", huh…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: We conducted a questionnaire, asking all the students "What is your image of Tracen Academy?".

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Of these, we selected "the grounds" as the top and most feasible motif, and drew up a design.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Our goal is to have a detailed recipe completed 5 days before the show. I believe we can reach this goal through plenty of trial and error.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Should you have any other ideas, please tell us. It would be very helpful to find something that we have not thought of.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Oh…! Well, then, may I take that challenge…!?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Of course. Let's split up then: me, Ms. Bourbon and Ms. Bakushin O, and Ms. Flower and Ms. Jordan.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha! I'm in charge of the whipped cream? Leave it to me! I'll set a world record in cream whipping!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ms. Bakushin O, I have a cooled whisk in the fridge, you can use that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, sir! —thashcold!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Hah hah, apologies. When it's warm, the structure of the milk fat in the cream softens, and as a result it won't hold air as well.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Recorded in memory. …Very informative

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: (… A-amazing… With her knowledge and hands, Flash looks like a pro…)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: (…! This is not the time to be staring! I was lucky enough to be invited, so I have to be useful!)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Okay, here we go…!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: We have reached the time target for completed prototypes. We will now begin the evaluation of each prototype. Let's start with yours, Ms. Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, this is a Scoop Cake that resembles the "grounds". It represents the actual grounds in miniature.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Next, we will view and evaluate Flower's and Jordan's prototypes. …? Um, where are your prototypes?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Sorry… It's…—

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: (I want to make something that can help Ms. Flash… So it's best to make something fancy, right…!?)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: We'll make an Opera! I think the shiny chocolate could represent the 'gravitas' of Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Capich- —bwegh this recipe's brutal!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Buttercream, ganache cream, coffee syrup, glaçage prepped! The dough has been chilled too!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Cray～, you pretty much made it on your own, Flower. What else was there to do, assemble this?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'll take care of it!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Gently, gently… Okay, I'm done with the coffee syrup. Let's see, now for the buttercream—

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: (Huh? It hardened…!)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: (Oh no, I've been going too slow. What should I do…! I'll have to melt it in hot water first—)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Aah!
(CLANG)

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: And… in my haste, I dropped the dough and… I didn't finish it. I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I see… I apologize for not noticing.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Just remember… failure is inevitable in baking. Please don't be discouraged.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! I'm sorry…!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Oh, I've gotten off track…! Please continue with the prototype checks!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —About that…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Now that I've made it, I realise… Does this really represent "Tracen Academy"?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: It's certainly our grounds with all its varied courses. That's not wrong, but — it's kind of literally just the school grounds…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I'd like to hear your opinions. When you see this Scoop Cake, do you feel that it represents Tracen Academy?

text_block_list.name: All 4
text_block_list.text: Tracen Academy…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Thanks. I'm convinced. This is not enough to reach the grand prize.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Perhaps… it should be a deeper expression of the concept of Tracen Academy… The first thing we need to—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —Excuse me, there's only 30 minutes and 20 seconds left. Let's move on to tasting and clean up. Please come back next time.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: … Fuu— Haa— Alright.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whoo! You're looking a lil' down! All good?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ms. Jordan…! Uh, well…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: I was just thinking that I need to get it together… That's all! I-I'm sorry for making you worry!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Aaahh— Hahn— I made her all self-conscious.

text_block_list.name: Docile Classmate
text_block_list.text: —…Eh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I'm saying! You gotta have fun and eat the yummies and you'll feel better in no time!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I heard you had some trouble with your trainer and all! Let's go grab a burger!

text_block_list.name: Docile Classmate
text_block_list.text: …Sorry. I can't switch mood that quickly. So… I'll pass. But thanks.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: … I haven't grown one bit! Shit! I suck at this!
